_source.short_desc: Recurly makes subscriptions a competitive advantage for leading brands worldwide.
_source.long_desc: Recurly is an all-in-one recurring billing platform, built specifically to handle the nuances of recurring billing for Mid-Market/Enterprise businesses. Recurly supports 16+ gateways, features unique gateway routing and intelligent retry to optimize payments and ensure your revenue stream is never disrupted, regardless of where you do business or how you take payments. Increase efficiency to collect revenue faster and simplify revenue recognition, and recover 70% of failed transactions.
_source.pricing_details: Expect Transparent Pricing. Recurly believes in making our services accessible for businesses of all sizes. With a low-cost monthly fee and pay-as-you-go model - we don't get paid until you do. No hidden fees. No high-pressure salespeople. No long-term contracts
_source.target_audience: Recurly, Inc. provides enterprise-class recurring billing management for thousands of subscription-based SaaS, Web 2.0, Mobile, content, and publishing businesses worldwide.

category_features.name: Deferred Billing
category_features.definition: Buyer isn't billed until the period is up without any interest charges

category_features.name: Dunning Management
category_features.definition: Process of automatically notifying clients when payments fail to ensure invoices are paid

category_features.name: Multi-Currency
category_features.definition: Manage and handle various international currencies

category_features.name: Multi-Period Recurring Billing
category_features.definition: Set recurrence time frame and corresponding rates i.e. monthly, semi-annually or annually

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Recurring Invoicing
category_features.definition: Generate recurring invoices

category_features.name: Recurring/Subscription Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients repeatedly based on set amount of time

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

related_products.short_desc: From payments to credit to fraud protection, PayPal Commerce Platform helps you meet your customers where they are.
related_products.features: Offer fixed or quantity pricing. Set billing cycles for the time period you want.

related_products.short_desc: An easy invoicing and accounting solution starting at $7.50/mth (first 4 mths). Join 24 million people who've already used FreshBooks.
related_products.features: Use FreshBooks' auto-billing feature to automatically invoice your customers and charge their credit cards on a regular basis by setting up recurring profiles. Try it free for 30 days, no credit card required.

related_products.short_desc: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.
related_products.features: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.

related_products.short_desc: Wave offers small business owners real double-entry accounting that is integrated with the rest of Wave's solutions, 100% free!
related_products.features: Wave offers 100% free, real double-entry accounting for small businesses. As a cloud-based software, Wave allows you to access your data from anywhere, add unlimited collaborators and work on all of your businesses from a single login. Wave eliminates data-entry and puts the financial reports you need at your fingers tips, allowing you to spend more time doing what you love. Your accounting is also seamlessly integrated with invoicing, receipt scanning, payment processing and payroll.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50%) is a cloud-based, all-in-one, accounting and business hub solution, designed for growing, small to mid-sized businesses. Get performance reporting with highly customizable tracking tools, automated workflows, and real-time revenue and cash flow management dashboards. Seamlessly integrate best-in-class Premium Apps like Salesforce and HubSpot (CRM), Bill.com (accounts payable), DocuSign, LeanLaw & more to expand your capabilities as your business needs grow.

related_products.short_desc: Tools for the modern professional: proposals, contracts, payments, and more.  Try 7 days free when you're ready.
related_products.features:
HoneyBook helps creative entrepreneurs and freelancers book more clients, manage projects and get paid all in one place. With our business management software, you can automate your busy work and stay on top of all your to-dos, saving time and money so you can grow your business. Its like your own personal assistant.

Small business owners and freelancers have used HoneyBook to increase their bookings and save time.

For your first 6 months, get HoneyBook for $1 per month with code ONLY1.

related_products.short_desc: Companies can create, manage, and edit recurring billings with the utmost ease and simplicity in just a couple of clicks.
related_products.features: Save time with automated invoice processes by integrating quotes, delivery orders, and contracts. Odoo?s intuitive billing tools eliminate the frustration of sending out reminders for late/outstanding payments. Easily configure automated follow-ups to more efficiently streamline billing and handle payments. Odoo is built to accept online payments, with a number of popular payment acquirers, and is synchronized with 24,000 banks, making it simple to link payments with statements.

related_products.short_desc: Bill.com is the intelligent business payments platform that delivers financial process efficiency, time savings, and full control.
related_products.features: Bill.com delivers financial process efficiency through streamlined accounts payable (AP) and accounts receivable (AR) management. Reduce errors and increase efficiency by leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Bill.com gets more intelligent as you use it, learning your processes and preferences to give you greater control over every aspect of bill management.

related_products.short_desc: Automate and streamline client billing with Regpack's full suite of onboarding and payment tools. Manage clients efficiently.
related_products.features: Automate and streamline your onboarding, billing, and client management tasks with Regpack. Our billing tools allow you to customize automated recurring billing plans, offer payment plans for one-time payments, all on your website or integrated into your product. Dynamic payment and product reporting allow you to manage and track revenue. Regpack supports subscriptions, memberships, events, online learning courses, or any business that needs to collect and manage client data and payments.

related_products.short_desc: Automate your AP/AR processes with Plooto's recurring payment and PAD - making your accounting process efficient and easier
related_products.features: Plooto is an all-in-one platform that enables businesses to automate their domestic and international accounts payable and accounts receivable functions by unifying payments, processes, control, and reporting. Get paid as soon as 2 business days with credit cards! Trusted by 6,000+ businesses, the platform also integrates with popular accounting systems such as Xero and QuickBooks to eliminate data entry and automate the reconciliation of bills and invoices.

related_products.short_desc: Invoice2go makes it easy to send invoices & estimates, accept online payments and manage your business. Free 30 day trial.
related_products.features:
Send professional invoices and estimates with Invoice2go.  Try it free for 30 days.

Easily create and send custom invoices with a few clicks, accept payments online and manage your business at-a-glance with business insights reporting.  

Looking for more tools to run your business? Invoice2go also features appointment scheduling, time tracking, expense tracking and more.  

Try our newest profiles and review features to increase visibility online and earn customer trust.

similar_products.short_desc: Fusebill offers flexible recurring billing and management software that allows businesses to scale through every stage of growth.
similar_products.features:
Automate recurring billing like hundreds of our clients in SaaS, IoT, media, and more. Eliminate manual billing. Reduce revenue leaks and churn. 

Fusebill simplifies all aspects of subscription billing and management, automating recurring invoicing, payments, and revenue recognition while streamlining customer lifecycle management to maximize revenue. Fusebill's flexible ledger-based platform allows you to scale your business with absolute confidence.

similar_products.short_desc: Web-based recurring billing and payments app that helps businesses save time, get paid faster, & have revenue reports ready.
similar_products.features: Web-based subscription, recurring billing, and payments app for any business looking to save time and get paid faster. With ChargeOver, you can automate manual processes and still be able to do things like one-time charges. Integrate ChargeOver with your accounting software (full integration with QuickBooks & Xero) or use our API to build ChargeOver right into your own application. Every step of the way, the Minneapolis, MN, based ChargeOver team is happy to help.

similar_products.short_desc: Resolve your recurring billing challenges and subscription billing challenges and revolutionize your B2B monetization to drive growth.
similar_products.features: BLUIQ helps businesses in the digital economy frustrated with billing, aggregate data to automate processes, generate new customer intelligence, and revolutionize growth. Founded as BluLogix in 2013, the BLUIQ platform offers the only true multi-tenant monetization and SaaS billing solution in the market. Our proprietary data-enrichment engine has helped 100+ companies get beyond billing and focus on identifying value-aligned relationship and revenue opportunities.

similar_products.short_desc: Recurring Billing Software to monetize new offerings, track customer subscription lifecycle, recognize and forecast revenue.
similar_products.features: Recurring Billing Software automates recurring billing operations to enable quick pricing and packaging for all of your subscription offerings. For competitive launches, the Recurring Billing Software offers various price structures for recurring, one-time, and usage-based charges, etc. The software makes it easy to manage renewals, upgrades/downgrades. It also shares valuable insights on customers' subscription lifecycle so you can upsell/cross-sell and track potential churn and new business.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate and streamline client billing with Regpack's full suite of onboarding and payment tools. Manage clients efficiently.
similar_products.features: Automate and streamline your onboarding, billing, and client management tasks with Regpack. Our billing tools allow you to customize automated recurring billing plans, offer payment plans for one-time payments, all on your website or integrated into your product. Dynamic payment and product reporting allow you to manage and track revenue. Regpack supports subscriptions, memberships, events, online learning courses, or any business that needs to collect and manage client data and payments.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho Subscriptions is an online recurring billing and subscription management software for your subscription business.
similar_products.features: Zoho Subscriptions is your one stop recurring billing and subscription management solution. Using Zoho Subscriptions, you can manage complex billing cycles, oversee customer subscriptions, automate invoicing and payment collection, manage failed payment retries and analyse your business growth. Some of our happy customers include LogiNext, EuroBox, HeadApp, Mobile Loyalty, Opiniion etc. Try out all the features in Zoho Subscriptions by signing up for a free test account today!

similar_products.short_desc: Complete payables automation, eliminating the manual processes related to paying suppliers and partners.
similar_products.features:
The world's leading payables automation solution, for accounts payable and global partner payments. Eliminating 80% of manual payables work and accelerating financial close by 25%.

Tiplati enables you to onboard suppliers, partners and freelancers with ease, eliminate invoice entry with fast OCR processing and make global payments to 190 countries in local currency. Also includes global tax compliance, 2 & 3 way PO matching, multi-entity support and ERP integrations and accounting systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Pay bills for free. Use bank transfer or card even if vendors only accept checks.
similar_products.features:
Melio is a free vendor/bill payment tool that maximizes cash flow and minimizes busywork. Pay bills using bank transfer or debit card for free even if they only accept checks! 

You can also use your credit card where cards are not accepted to hold onto your cash longer and earn card rewards! 

Melio automatically syncs with your QuickBooks and even mails checks on your behalf to vendors so you don't need to cut checks anymore.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate and electronically send invoices and track payments.  Unlimited customers & invoices.  ReliaBills is 100% FREE to use.
similar_products.features: ReliaBills is a cloud-based recurring billing and invoicing platform with proven tools to help you navigate the subscription economy.  With tools such as recurring invoice templates, failed payment reminders, a flexible re-authorization cycle, account updater and more, ReliaBills helps you better manage your recurring billings.  Unlimited customers, unlimited invoices and unlimited emails.  Try it now for FREE!

similar_products.short_desc: Let your clients pay online with credit cards or PayPal. Automate to get your invoicing and billing tasks out of the way. Free Trial!
similar_products.features: Get your invoicing and billing tasks out of the way, automate your billing processes to save time and focus on boosting your business. Easily issue beautiful invoices from your desktop or mobile, and speed up payments with automatic client reminders.

similar_products.short_desc: sticky.io is the go-to subscription ecommerce platform for lasting bonds between brands and people.
similar_products.features: sticky.io is a fast-scaling, subscription and recurring billing platform built for direct-to-consumer and subscription commerce. sticky.io integrates with any storefront or front-end application to broaden billing and order management capabilities. With sticky.io's advanced analytics and reporting, brands have a 360-degree view of the customer and can identify what actions will make the biggest impact in optimizing opportunities and maximizing revenue.

similar_products.short_desc: SubscriptionFlow is automated subscription management & payment processing platform for businesses to manage recurring billing/payments
similar_products.features: SubscriptionFlow is a highly customizable and extendable SaaS subscription management system that offer innovative tools to reduce churn, increase customer acquisition & retention rates, & curb revenue losses. It is an all-inclusive automated subscription billing and payment processing platform equipped with robust features for handling subscriptions, managing subscribers, proration, dunning, billing & tax mgmt., integrations, pricing optimization, payment processing,

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounts Receivable software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounts Receivable tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounts Receivable software deals with money that is owed to an organization. It automates the recording of payments on outstanding invoices and provides reports on collection and aging. Along with reports, Accounts Receivable applications generate monthly customer statements and collection letters. Accounts Receivable solutions integrate with Accounting software. Accounts Receivable software is related to Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Billing and Invoicing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Billing and Invoicing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Billing and Invoicing software automates the process of producing and sending invoices and receiving payments. These applications enable the efficient processing of complex accounts across multiple customers and product lines, incorporating contract data and customer relationship management tools. Billing and Invoicing solutions are designed to work with accounting applications and provide a variety of business reporting tools. Billing and Invoicing software is related to Procurement software and Purchasing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Debt Collection software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Debt Collection tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Debt Collection software automates the management and accounting process for overdue invoices on behalf of an organization or a specialized collection agency. Debt Collection applications can integrate with existing accounting and invoicing systems. Debt Collection software is related to Accounting software, Banking Systems software and Billing and Invoicing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Billing software automates time tracking, billing, calendaring and accounting for law practices. These applications facilitate legal-style hourly billing and recording of case-related expenses. Many Legal Billing solutions also feature integration for a broad range of case and workflow management tools as well as accounting and payroll features across multiple office locations. Legal Billing software is related to Law Practice Management software, Professional Services Automation software and Time and Expense software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Billing software manages patient billing and collections for the medical industry. Hospitals, clinics, and doctors offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential business processes including: accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Medical Billing solutions typically allow for the tracking of patient demographics, background data, and insurance information. Medical Billing software is related to Chiropractic software, Claims Processing software, Dental software, Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software and Medical Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Publishing and Subscriptions software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Publishing and Subscriptions tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Publishing and Subscriptions software enables electronic data management and distribution by automating business processes for the publishing industry. These applications integrate title information, product development, scheduling, and other information between editorial, marketing, catalog, and production departments, affording organizations greater productivity, optimized revenue and better customer service. Publication and Subscriptions software automates the management of subscription sales and retention. These solutions also help to automate the sale of digital goods, including Digital Rights Management (DRM).

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Subscription Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Subscription Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Subscription Management software supports businesses that offer their products and services on a subscription basis by enabling flexible billing options and promotion automation.

Optimize your checkout pages for conversion with Recurly.js and increase completion rate. Recurly supports 16+ gateways and multiple payment options, including PayPal, making domestic and international payments easy and efficient. related_products.short_desc: From payments to credit to fraud protection, PayPal Commerce Platform helps you meet your customers where they are.
related_products.features: With a simple, single integration you can accept debit and credit cards, PayPal, PayPal Credit, 10+ local payment methods in over 100 currencies and from 200+ markets around the world.

related_products.short_desc: Stripe makes it easy for your business to start collecting credit cards online immediately.  No merchant account or gateway necessary.
related_products.features: Stripe is a technology company that builds economic infrastructure for the internet. Businesses of every size from new startups to public companies use our software to accept payments and manage their businesses online. Stripe makes it easy for your business to start collecting credit cards online immediately.  No merchant account or gateway necessary.

related_products.short_desc: Square powers secure payments even when you dont use a reader. Virtual Terminal for over-the-phone transactions, Invoices and more!
related_products.features: Accept every way your customers want to pay with Square Payments. Get a free magstripe reader to swipe credit cards anywhere. Take chip cards and NFC payments with Square Reader for contactless and chip. With Squares credit card processing, you can accept all major cards and get deposits as fast as the next business day. We offer chargeback protection, fraud detection, account takeover protection, and more, so you can focus on your customers. Its free to sign up and fast to get set up.

related_products.short_desc: Marketing 360 Payments for SMB. Integrate all your revenue into M360 payments and build profitable marketing campaigns in one place.
related_products.features: Marketing 360 payments. Set up your store or business to create invoices & send payments in minutes. Everything you need to manage and grow your business all from a singular platform.

related_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to run your business: proposals, contracts, invoicing, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

related_products.short_desc: Keep up with consumer demand by accepting the newest payment methods on the market.
related_products.features:
As a leader in retail and hospitality technology, we know what businesses need to thrive and serve their customers. Epos Now POS systems and payment processing terminals are built with flexibility in mind. Choose from our range of devices to implement the payment processing solution that suits you best.

With Epos Now Payments, customers can pay with major debit and credit cards, eWallets like Apple Pay, and even services like AliPay.

related_products.short_desc: PaySimple is the leading payments management solution for service-based businesses, powering the cashflow of over 20,000 companies.
related_products.features: PaySimple is the leading payments management solution for service-based businesses, powering the cashflow of over 20,000 companies nationwide. PaySimple builds long-term partnerships with companies to drive growth providing flexible payment and billing solutions and personalized customer service to suit their distinct business needs. With a robust API, PaySimple is a trusted technology partner for payment integrations; natively handling cashflow within SaaS products and mobile applications.

related_products.short_desc: Ideal for SMBs and accountants, Plooto is the fastest way to manage business payments, AP & AR process & receive credit card payments.
related_products.features: Plooto is an all-in-one platform that enables businesses to automate their domestic and international accounts payable and accounts receivable functions by unifying payments, processes, control, and reporting. Get paid as soon as 2 business days with credit cards! Trusted by 6,000+ businesses, the platform also integrates with popular accounting systems such as Xero and QuickBooks to eliminate data entry and automate the reconciliation of bills and invoices.

similar_products.short_desc: Corpay offers automated payments in a single electronic workflow and helps vendors process their payments correctly.
similar_products.features: Corpay is a payables automation solution that streamlines all your invoice payments into a single digital process, across multiple locations, bank accounts, payment methods, and approval hierarchies. When it's time for a payment run, you submit and approve payments in our software, then Corpay pays vendors according to their remit-to instructions and in their preferred method. We manage payment data for all your vendors and proactively reach out to resolve unprocessed payments.

similar_products.short_desc: Bill.com is the intelligent business payments platform that delivers financial process efficiency, time savings, and full control.
similar_products.features: Bill.com delivers financial process efficiency through streamlined accounts payable (AP) and accounts receivable (AR) management. Reduce errors and increase efficiency by leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Bill.com gets more intelligent as you use it, learning your processes and preferences to give you greater control over every aspect of bill management.

similar_products.short_desc: Take your AP and AR processes to the next level in automation with Scrypt's truly touchless AI data capture technology.
similar_products.features:
Data processing using AI and machine learning still requires human intervention--for data entry, coding, writing rules, templating, approvals and more.

Until now. 

What was once merely automated is now autonomous with Scrypt. Our integrated payables and receivables platform revolutionizes the way you deal with data--or rather, the way you don't deal with it. By simulating human thinking, Scrypt can read any document or image, then learn, discover and perform judgment-based tasks on its own.

similar_products.short_desc: Square powers secure payments even when you dont use a reader. Virtual Terminal for over-the-phone transactions, Invoices and more!
similar_products.features: Accept every way your customers want to pay with Square Payments. Get a free magstripe reader to swipe credit cards anywhere. Take chip cards and NFC payments with Square Reader for contactless and chip. With Squares credit card processing, you can accept all major cards and get deposits as fast as the next business day. We offer chargeback protection, fraud detection, account takeover protection, and more, so you can focus on your customers. Its free to sign up and fast to get set up.

similar_products.short_desc: Stax Payments is a subscription-based payment technology company offering 0% markup payment processing.
similar_products.features:
Stax delivers 0% markup payment processing services through a subscription-based pricing model. This model can save business owners up to 40% per month on processing fees. 

Stax Pay is an all-in-one payment processing solution that allows business owners of all sizes to take payments in any way that they need: in-person, keyed, mobile, contactless, etc.

similar_products.short_desc:
All-in-one 
Ease of use
Enterprise-Grade / Scalable
similar_products.features: Birdeye Payments helps local businesses collect payments faster through modern and convenient ways. Customers can pay effortlessly, via text or online (roadmap) wherever they may be, at home or in the office.

similar_products.short_desc: Consumer-grade checkout experience for B2B. Offer buyers Net Terms, ACH/wire, check, CC, and installment methods - all in seconds.
similar_products.features:
The first consumer-grade payment experience for B2B.

B2B payments are complex as B2B buyers often don't want to pay by card. They want invoicing, net terms (BNPL), installments, and milestone or recurring payments. They want to pay by ACH, wire, or check. 

Balance accepts 100% of these B2B payment complexities, letting your B2B buyers check out in seconds. You get one fully reconciled and consolidated payout to your bank. So do your vendors.

similar_products.short_desc: Stripe makes it easy for your business to start collecting credit cards online immediately.  No merchant account or gateway necessary.
similar_products.features: Stripe is a technology company that builds economic infrastructure for the internet. Businesses of every size from new startups to public companies use our software to accept payments and manage their businesses online. Stripe makes it easy for your business to start collecting credit cards online immediately.  No merchant account or gateway necessary.

similar_products.short_desc: EBizCharge payment gateway integrates with ERP/accounting solutions and eCommerce shopping carts to lower credit card processing costs.
similar_products.features: EBizCharge payment gateway integrates with over 100 ERP, CRM, accounting, and eCommerce solutions, and is designed to: reduce processing costs by 15-40%, increase payment processing efficiency, eliminate double entry, reduce human error, improve security and simplify the customer experience. EBizCharge provides online and mobile credit card processing, unlimited transaction history, customizable reports, electronic invoicing, secure encryption and tokenization, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: B2B payment processing & management solution that automates the entire process related to paying suppliers and partners.
similar_products.features: Tipalti provides the world's most powerful payment processing solution, automating the entire process of making payments to global suppliers and partners. Tipalti's holistic platform provides one cloud system including supplier management, tax compliance, procurement, invoice management, global payments, AP reporting and reconciliation, and ERP integration. Clients typically wipe out 80% of their AP workload, while accelerating financial close 25% and strengthening financial controls.

similar_products.short_desc: Finally, a way to collect payments and build a customer database, automatically. See how with Fivestars.
similar_products.features: Need a better way to process payments and build a database of your customers? Over 15,000 businesses use Fivestars to collect payments, all while bringing customers back 2x more often with text, email, and mobile app marketing tools. We provide you with a free Customer Touchscreen that accepts credit cards and signs up customers, all at once. With AutoPilot and Unlimited Promotions, stay top of mind by automatically reaching out to your customers with the right offer at the right time.

similar_products.short_desc: Pay bills for free. Use bank transfer or card even if vendors only accept checks.
similar_products.features:
Melio is a free vendor/bill payment tool that maximizes cash flow and minimizes busywork. Pay vendors using bank transfer or debit card for free even if they only accept checks! 

You can also use your credit card where cards are not accepted to hold onto your cash longer and earn card rewards! 

Melio automatically syncs with your QuickBooks and even mails checks on your behalf to vendors so you don't need to cut checks anymore.

similar_products.short_desc: CSG Forte simplifies the complexities of payment processing and alleviates the burden of a distributed payment ecosystem.
similar_products.features: CSG Forte offers merchants and partners a broad range of payment solutions, including credit card processing, ACH/eCheck origination, check verification, check recovery, card account updater, bill presentment and payment, point of sale terminals, integrated checkout forms and more. Through superior customer service and a modern payments stack, CSG Forte is dedicated to helping organizations of all sizes optimize revenue, increase efficiencies, reduce PCI scope and mitigate risk.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Billing and Invoicing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Billing and Invoicing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Billing and Invoicing software automates the process of producing and sending invoices and receiving payments. These applications enable the efficient processing of complex accounts across multiple customers and product lines, incorporating contract data and customer relationship management tools. Billing and Invoicing solutions are designed to work with accounting applications and provide a variety of business reporting tools. Billing and Invoicing software is related to Procurement software and Purchasing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Point of Sale software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Point of Sale tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Point of Sale (POS) software automates the capture of financial and sales transactions. Retail POS systems are among the most sophisticated and powerful computer networks in commercial use. Point of Sale systems integrate core business functions such as sales tracking, accounts receivable, purchasing and inventory management across multiple registers or retail branches. POS software also provides the infrastructure for connecting retail locations with supply chain operations and upper management.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Restaurant POS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Restaurant POS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Restaurant POS software offers point of sale solutions specifically for the restaurant and bar industries. This type of software provides ordering, billing, reporting, accounting, table tracking, and receipt printing capabilities for restaurants and bars. Hardware such as computers, monitors and printers is often included in the purchase of POS systems. Restaurant POS software is related to POS software and Restaurant Management software.
